com.providenceuniversal.gim

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.providenceuniversal.gim.Client

  • public class Client
extends Object
    The Client class is half of the core of G-Instant Messenger™ (aside Server class). It acts as a client, facilitating communication with the server and providing a user-friendly CLI exposing the full functionality of G-Instant Messenger™.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Garikai Gumbo
    Providence Universal Studios®
    Copyright © 2018.
    All rights reserved.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client(ObjectInputStream incomingResponses, ObjectOutputStream outgoingRequests, Scanner keyboardInput)
      Creates new client and initializes the client's incomingResponses, outgoingRequests and keyboardInput instance variables respectively, with the corresponding parameter values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(ObjectInputStream incomingResponses,
              ObjectOutputStream outgoingRequests,
              Scanner keyboardInput)
        Creates new client and initializes the client's incomingResponses, outgoingRequests and keyboardInput instance variables respectively, with the corresponding parameter values.
        Parameters:
        incomingResponses - ObjectInputStream storing responses coming from server
        outgoingRequests - ObjectOutputStream storing client requests bound for server
        keyboardInput - Scanner storing the keyboardInput stream
